scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] ] -g uglifyify src/main.jsx -o js/main.js
scripts.build-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react ] ] -t [ envify ] src/main.jsx -o js/main.js
